define: Use this api to get tracking number for courier delivery method.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The start time of creation time

","name":"from_date","sample":"2024-10-01","type":"string","required":"True","key":"mABBrZd"},{"description":"

The end time of creation time

","name":"to_date","sample":"2024-10-28","type":"string","required":"True","key":"ynPkYHM"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. limit [1, 50]

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"KsKtTaH"},{"description":"

Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is \"\". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"cursor","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"mBnjeec"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xjeHyEJ"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JeQCtbW"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"jxxfCKj"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"aSddCse","children":[{"description":"","name":"tracking_number_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"QTDmcTC","children":[{"description":"

The generated binding ID.

","name":"binding_id","sample":"DCN248699144540RU","type":"string","required":null,"key":"tZAmaeQ"},{"description":"

The generate first-mile tracking number, value might be blank.

","name":"first_mile_tracking_number","sample":"ZJS1729224232\t","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bbDASep"},{"description":"

The logistics status for first-mile tracking number. Status could be:

CANCELED
CANCELING
DELIVERED
NOT_AVAILABLE
ORDER_CREATED
ORDER_RECEIVED
PICKED_UP


Note: NOT_AVAILABLE status means that Binding ID / First Mile Tracking Number is not yet bound with any order.

","name":"status","sample":"ORDER_RECEIVED","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JcRCHfC"},{"description":"

Indicate the reason when Shopee failed to place courier order to 3PL (Kuaidi 100 supporting) or courier company cancelled the order.


Note: Will be empty if status is not CANCELED.

","name":"reason","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"hkEXEKW"},{"description":"

The declare date of binding ID/first-mile tracking number.

","name":"declare_date","sample":"2024-10-18","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bapkJbJ"}]},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the tracking number list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve tracking numbers.

","name":"more","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"YEBJNGr"},{"description":"

If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.

","name":"next_cursor","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"XMNBwzy"}]}]}
